root.name: Dragon History
root.description: OverviewDeveloped by some high school students in the Czech Republic in 1994-1995, this classic 2D point and click adventure game is the first Czech game ever to have been released on a CD. StoryYou play as Bert, a small dragon who is looking for his missing father. Freeware releaseThe game has been made freely available (and its source and graphic assets made opensource) by the original developers and can be downloaded here. It requires ScummVM to run and is available in English, Czech and Polish.
